en: Once left, you will not be able to return. Your score will be calculated immediately. \nAre you sure you want to leave the city?
zh: 一旦出城，将无法返回。你的分数会被立即结算。\n确定要出城吗？
+ %s -> + %s\n完成任务获得的交换券张数\nLv. %s -> %s / %s

en: Increase the interaction radius to interact with adjacent grids.  (Time only increases when you move)
zh: 增加交互范围，可以和相邻的格子交互。（时间只在移动时流逝）

en: The lottery grid can now be triggered when passing by.
zh: 抽奖格现在路过也会触发。

en: Unlock the ability to change moving direction when planning.
zh: 规划移动时可以无视朝向，往任意方向移动。

en: Unlock the ability to accept quests from NPCs remotely.
zh: 解锁远程向村民接取任务的能力。

en: NPCs' Fruit Quests can be submitted remotely.
zh: 可以远程交付村民的水果任务。

en: Shop can now be viewed remotely.
White and Rainbow balls is now added to the Traffic Shop and its Mystery Boxes.
zh: 白球 和 彩球 现在可以在交通商店及其出售的盲盒中获取。

en: Shops can now be manually restocked 3 times per day.
zh: 商店的货物现在每天可以手动刷新 3 次。
